about_the_game:
Welcome to LiteByte!


Embark on a delightful and captivating journey with LiteByte, the latest puzzle game brought to you by the creative mind of RantCPU. LiteByte ingeniously combines the strategic mechanics of the classic Minesweeper with the enchanting image discovery of color light games, offering a truly unique and engaging experience.

Discover Hidden Wonders
Each level in LiteByte presents a new challenge, inviting you to uncover beautiful, hidden images. The gameplay is designed to keep you entertained as you navigate through each puzzle, revealing stunning visuals along the way.

A Blend of Strategy and Fun
LiteByte offers the perfect balance of strategy and fun. The familiar mechanics of Minesweeper are enhanced with the joy of revealing captivating images, creating a gameplay experience that is both engaging and enjoyable. Whether you're a puzzle enthusiast or just looking for some low-stress entertainment, LiteByte has something special to offer.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04+, Fedora 39+, Debian 10+
  • Processor: amd64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04+, Fedora 39+, Debian 10+
  • Processor: amd64
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 12+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 12+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: RantCPU LiteByte

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (2012 or later)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to LiteByte, a mindful puzzle game where you reveal beautiful images. Combining the mechanics of classic Minesweeper with the image discovery of color light games, LiteByte offers a unique experience. Embark on a relaxing journey of discovery and uncover hidden wonders.
